message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it evenly, it's the fairest way to start.
You didn't take my first offer, now I want a bit more
I'm willing to give you a little more this time, but I think a near-even split is the best for us both.
Inflation is rising, I need a bigger share to make up for it
We're running out of time, let's get closer to a fair split before inflation eats away everything.
